blogPost.excerpt: Calculate the estimated cost of a top 10 Google ranking for any search term. Just enter your target keyword and https://howmuchtorank.com/ will calculate the budget you need for a top 10 ranking and generate a list of SEO recommendations for how to get there.
blogPost.body: Calculate the estimated cost of a top 10 Google ranking for any search term. Just enter your target keyword and https://howmuchtorank.com/ will calculate the budget you need for a top 10 ranking and generate a list of SEO recommendations for how to get there.
blogPost.title: How Much To Rank - Google ranking cost calculator
blogPost.author: Julia Kranz

localize.description: 计算任何搜索词的前10名谷歌排名的估计成本。只需输入您的目标关键词，https://howmuchtorank.com/ 将计算出您获得前十名排名所需的预算，并生成一份SEO建议列表，说明如何获得排名。
計算任何搜索詞的前10名谷歌排名的估計成本。只需輸入您的目標關鍵詞，https://howmuchtorank.com/ 將計算出您獲得前十名排名所需的預算，並生成一份SEO建議列表，說明如何獲得排名。

previous.excerpt: BCPRO.APP is a free research-based online tool that uses genetic factors to analyze a person’s risk of developing a severe case of COVID–19. ⠀ We score your 23andMe, Ancestry, or MyHeritage raw data, and turn the insights into a report in less than 1 minute.
previous.title: BCPRO.APP - Kick COVID using your DNA data… before it kicks you

localize.description: BCPRO.APP是一款免费的研究型在线工具，它利用遗传因素分析一个人患COVID-19重症的风险。⠀我们对您的23andMe、Ancestry或MyHeritage原始数据进行打分，并在1分钟内将洞察力转化为报告。
localize.tagline: 用你的DNA数据踢掉COVID... 在它踢掉你之前。

localize.description: BCPRO.APP是一款免費的研究型在線工具，它利用遺傳因素分析一個人患COVID-19重症的風險。⠀我們對您的23andMe、Ancestry或MyHeritage原始數據進行打分，並在1分鐘內將洞察力轉化爲報告。
localize.tagline: 用你的DNA數據踢掉COVID... 在它踢掉你之前。

next.excerpt: The very first sponsorship marketplace for Clubhouse 👋 We're letting CH hosts monetize their content by partnering with global brands. Check out the earnings calculator on our website. Applications are open for early access ‍🎉
next.title: Clubmarket - Clubhouse hosts can get paid through brand sponsorships 💸
